content:
That sounds like a wonderful plan! You're creating a beautiful and engaging atmosphere for your garden party. The flower crown station, vintage garden games, and lawn games will provide plenty of entertainment for your guests. The scavenger hunt will encourage guests to explore the garden and appreciate its beauty. The tea leaf reader will add a touch of mystique and whimsy, and the photobooth will be a great way to capture memories of the day.

Remember to also consider the logistics of the party, such as:

* Providing comfortable seating and shade for your guests
* Offering refreshing drinks and snacks throughout the day
* Having a plan in place for inclement weather (just in case!)
* Assigning a few volunteers or staff to help with setup, supervision, and cleanup

With your attention to detail and creativity, I'm sure your garden party will be a huge success! Your guests will appreciate the thought and effort you've put into creating a unique and memorable experience.

Now, I think we've covered all the major aspects of your garden party. Is there anything else you'd like to discuss or any other questions you have?
